general_info.summary: This document lists various programs, schools, and initiatives at Sharda University for the 2025-26 period. It includes academic components like the School of Dental Sciences, Medical Sciences & Research, Nursing Science & Research, an Examination Annual Report, Academic Bank of Credits, curricula feedback, and a university brochure. The document also covers university structure and governance (Leadership, History, Statutory Bodies), administrative functions (Sharda Tenders, Act, Statutes, Ordinances), and student/faculty development through various skill enhancement programs, counseling services, entrepreneurship initiatives, and FM radio. Additionally, it mentions international campuses and specific courses.

career_info.summary: This text outlines career paths and benefits associated with a course, mentioning a "Research & Development Software Engineer" role with an average annual package ranging from 4.50 LPA to 12.00 LPA. It also lists various resources and information points for students, including recruiter details, COVID-19 updates, a mentoring portal, visa and insurance guidelines, and observership programs.
career_info.raw_content:
Career path you can choose after the course
• Research & Development Software Engineer
